desc: Hello Tele callers,If you are good in telesales ( In any Indian Languages) or field sales then read below.We are coming up with a potential revenue generating business website which will lead you to earn excellent money.Here is a link to start up website : [url removed, login to view] (currently  the content is for informative only, the real content will be hosted soon after development of the website)The website is a business listing, mainly focusing on training institutes & private tutors in India in all major cities.Competitors are [url removed, login to view] ,[url removed, login to view], [url removed, login to view]Training institutes & private tutors will signup in our website, course seekers/Training seekers will search for training institutes or tutors in their cities.Excellent features of our website are:course seekers can directly chat with institutes/tutorscourse seekers can request demo classes to institutes/tutorscourse seekers can send enquiries to institutes/tutors.There are 5 types of paid services in our website for institutes/tutors which you can choose from.1: Regular subscription ( 3/6/12 months) - average Rs 3000 for 3 months - These are  premium members and these members have priority over basic (free) members in our search results. Initially we are providing 6 months free premium membership to all institutes & tutors , so this will not be available for you for 6 months.2: Priority Display: If any institute or tutor want their profile to be displayed always at the top f the results then they have to take this paid service, There priority 1/2/3/4/5 display services in our website.Priority 1 display means: The institute/tutor will be always shown at the top in search resultsPriority 2 display means: The institute/tutor will be always shown 2nd top in search resultsPriority 3 display means: The institute/tutor will be always shown 3rd top in search resultsPriority 4 display means: The institute/tutor will be always shown 4th top in search results.Priority 5 display means: The institute/tutor will be always shown 5th top in search resultsPlease note: There are around 2000 courses and around 40 major cities. each above service is for each city & collection of courses, ex: an Institute can buy 10 courses ( Java related) for Delhi, then any user who search for java related course in Delhi then the paid institute will be shown at the top 5 ( depends on which one they have paid for)Priority 1 price is around Rs15,000 for 3 months. .. Priority 2 price is around Rs12,000 for 3 months. .. Priority 3 price is around Rs10,000 for 3 months. .. so on.3: Top Banner display.Institutes/tutor can advertise their profile at the top of the search result page, This is basically to brand their name.Please note: There are around 2000 courses and around 40 major cities. above service is for each city & collection of courses, ex: an Institute can buy 10 courses ( Java related) for Delhi, then any user who search for java related course in Delhi then the paid institute will be shown at the top 5 ( depends on which one they have paid for)Top banner display price is around Rs10,000 for 3 months. ..4: Side banners:same as top banners.We will be paying up to 50% of the service price for selling these services.This is a potential revenue generation business, please contact us if you think you can speak to training institutes/tutors in your area & turn them to a business for us.Please note this is not a fixed paid job, This is affiliate sales, means you will get % on each sale you make. If you are from a metro cities then its very beneficial for you as you can reach the training/coaching centres on daily basis & explain them how they can be benefitted from our website.The website will be hosted in 1-2 months of time.
title: Affiliate Marketing - Potential Revenue - Average Rs 2 Lack per month revenue per city
